languages.text: "Я за то, чтобы бросить ее подыхать тут. В муках. И гвоздь в ухо забить, чтобы, умирая, вспоминала о нас".
"I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."
languages.original_text: "Я за то, чтобы бросить ее подыхать тут. В муках. И гвоздь в ухо забить, чтобы, умирая, вспоминала о нас".

traits.locale_text: "I'm all for leaving her here to die. Suffering. And put a nail into her ear, so she wouldn't forget us even if she could."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm all for leaving her here to die. Suffering. And put a nail into her ear, so she wouldn't forget us even if she could."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm all for leaving her here to die. Suffering. Putting a nail into her ear, so she wouldn't forget us even if she could."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm all for leaving her here to die. Suffering. Putting a nail into her ear, so she wouldn't forget us even if she could."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je propose qu'on la laisse mourir ici, pour qu'elle souffre jusqu'à la fin. Et qu'on lui enfonce un clou dans l'oreille pour qu'elle ne nous oublie pas. »
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."

traits.locale_text: « Je propose qu'on la laisse mourir ici, pour qu'elle souffre jusqu'à la fin. Et qu'on lui enfonce un clou dans l'oreille pour qu'elle ne nous oublie pas. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Por mí que se pudra aquí. Que sufra. Y deberíamos perforarle la oreja con un clavo para que se acuerde de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."

traits.locale_text: «Por mí que se pudra aquí. Que sufra. Póngale un clavo en la oreja para que no pueda olvidarnos ni aunque quiera».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “要我说，我们应该把她丢在这里等死，让她死前好好受苦。还应该往她耳朵里钉根钉子，好让她绝对不会忘记我们。”
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."

traits.locale_text: “我完全赞成把她丢在这里等死，让她死前好好受苦。还可以往她耳朵里钉根钉子，好让她绝对不会忘了我们。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女はここに死ぬまで残すのがいいんじゃないかしら。苦しみと苦痛の中でね。耳に釘も打ち込んでおくべきかも。そうすれば、あたい達のことを忘れられなくなるわ」
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女はここに死ぬまで残すのがいいんじゃないかしら。苦しみと苦痛の中でね。耳に釘も打ち込んでおくべきかも。そうすれば、あたい達のことを忘れられなくなるわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sage, wir lassen sie hier sterben. In Schmerz und Qual. Außerdem sollten wir einen Nagel in ihr Ohr schlagen, damit sie sich an uns erinnert."
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin absolut dafür, sie hier zurückzulassen und sterben zu lassen. Leiden. Ihr einen Nagel ins Ohr zu schlagen, damit sie uns nicht vergisst, selbst wenn sie es könnte."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bence burada kaderiyle baş başa bırakalım. Acı ve eziyeti tatsın. Hatta bizden hatıra olsun diye kulağına da bir çivi çakalım."
languages.original_text: "I say we leave her here to die. In pain and torment. We should drive a nail into her ear too, so she has something to remember us by."
